    • Method Detail

      • refillMap

        public void refillMap()
        Check for the squares with no AmmoTile or not full of Weapons

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String user,
                      Character character)
        Create the new player into the game model of the game
        Parameters:
        user - is the player username
        character - is the chosen character

      • newRound

        public void newRound()
        Generate a new RoundManager for the next player based on the game state and run it. If the player who should play the round is in the disconnection queue, call his remove from the game.

      • getModel

        public GameModel getModel()
        Getter method
        Returns:
        the GameModel associated with the game

        Getter method
        Returns:

        Getter method
        Returns:
        the first player played flag

      • getDisconnectionManager

        public DisconnectionManager getDisconnectionManager()
        Getter method for the disconnection manager. If it is not instanced, generate one and return it.
        Returns:
        the disconnection manager

      • setPlayerTurn
